name: Eye of artist
description:
In a forgotten medieval settlement, sheltered by the protection of the castle, ordinary people once lived. They were engaged in agriculture, animal husbandry and fishing. And formidable warriors stood on the defense of the castle. But one day everything changed: several objects, from cabbage beds to entire trees, just disappeared and time stopped.

Eye of Artist is a 3D puzzle game where you have to place some items from a list where they belong. Look for clues in your surroundings, carefully study each yard and don't forget: it's not as easy as it seems at first glance!

Game Features:
- Large and detailed location
- Nice low poly graphics
- Relaxing soundtrack
